title: Crossroads Rock Concert
creator_credit: Richard Hodder, Salvation Army and Salvation Army. Australia Southern Territory
brief_description: Three Christian rock groups gig together in aid of Salvation Army’s Crossroads Program for Homeless Youth, interspersed with modern parables about being young and different from the crowd. “Crossroads” is a video about, and for, contemporary Christian youth.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Hodder, Salvation Army and Salvation Army. Australia Southern Territory
